name: Coventry Building Society
goal: Coventry Building Society is the third largest building society in the UK with assets exceeding ?36 billion. The Society has over 1.8 million members with a network of 70 branches. It is one of the UK?s largest savings deposit providers and a top ten mortgage lender. Coventry Building Society is committed to its mission to Put Members First and is currently ranked number 1 for mortgages and savings by Fairer Finance, based on trust, customer happiness, complaint handling and transparency.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society
euInitiatives:
All financial services related initiatives, policies and legislative files including:

Better regulation
